thread.title_full: Day 2 Of PM Modi's Meditation: Arghya To Sun, Chants Mantras At Vivekananda Rock Memorial In Kanyakumari | Visuals | Times Now

author: Ajay Kumar
title: Day 2 Of PM Modi's Meditation: Arghya To Sun, Chants Mantras At Vivekananda Rock Memorial In Kanyakumari | Visuals | Times Now
text: New Delhi: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is undergoing a meditation session at Vivekananda Rock Memorial in Kanyakumari, two months after electrifying campaigns for Lok Sabha Elections 2024. The PM began his 45-hour-long meditation session on Friday at the Dhyan Mandapam, the very site where Swami Vivekananda himself sought enlightenment in 1892.The visuals of PM Modi walking, praying and meditating at the centre has now surfaced where the Prime Minister could also be seen offering water to the God Sun. He is also praying here and chanting mantras. The PM is also seen seeing blessings of Swami Vivekanand. PM Modi meditation The historic site is situated at the meeting point of the Indian Ocean, Bay of Bengal, and the Arabian Sea, Kanyakumari and holds symbolic significance, with BJP leaders emphasising its choice as a message of national unity.Arriving in Kanyakumari on Thursday evening, Prime Minister Modi, eyeing a third term, is expected to conclude his visit and return to Delhi on June 1. The marathon Lok Sabha polls, spanning seven phases, are set to culminate today (on June 1), with the eagerly awaited results slated for June 4.The Lok Sabha polls witnessed marathon rallies by the leaders of political parties as battle intensified between BJP-led NDA bloc and opposition's INDIA coalition. The NDA side has put 'Modi ki guarantee' as its USP for the polls while opposition has tried to counter the ruling dispensation with the charge of corruption, inflation, and unemployment among others.
